TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindingExpression extends System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase implements class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener
Public NotInheritable Class BindingExpression Inherits BindingExpressionBase

summary.span: 含有 之單一執行個體的詳細資訊。

span.span: Contains information about a single instance of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是繫結的宣告的高層級的類別。The class is the high-level class for the declaration of a binding. 類別為基礎的物件會維護繫結來源與繫結目標之間的連線。The class is the underlying object that maintains the connection between the binding source and the binding target. A包含可以跨數個共用的所有資訊物件。A contains all the information that can be shared across several objects. A無法共用，並包含所有執行個體資訊相關的執行個體運算式。A is an instance expression that cannot be shared and that contains all the instance information about the . 例如，請考慮下列項目，其中`myDataObject`的執行個體`MyData`類別`myBinding`來源物件，和`MyData`類別是包含名為字串屬性的定義的類別`MyDataProperty`。For example, consider the following, where `myDataObject` is an instance of the `MyData` class, `myBinding` is the source object, and `MyData` class is a defined class that contains a string property named `MyDataProperty`. 此範例中會繫結內容的文字`mytext`，這是執行個體至`MyDataProperty`。This example binds the text content of `mytext`, which is an instance of , to `MyDataProperty`. [!code-csharp[CodeOnlyBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CodeOnlyBinding/CSharp/binding.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeOnlyBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CodeOnlyBinding/VisualBasic/App.vb#1)] 您可以使用相同`myBinding`物件以建立其他的繫結。You can use the same `myBinding` object to create other bindings. 例如，您可能會使用`myBinding`要繫結文字內容的核取方塊，以物件`MyDataProperty`。For example, you might use the `myBinding` object to bind the text content of a check box to `MyDataProperty`. 在這種情況下，會有兩個執行個體共用`myBinding`物件。In that scenario, there will be two instances of that share the `myBinding` object. 您可以取得物件使用方法或資料繫結物件上的方法。You can obtain a object by using the method or the method on a data-bound object.

summary.span: 取得這個 所使用的繫結來源物件。

value.span: 這個 所使用的繫結來源物件。

span.span: The binding source object that this uses.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示實作用事件處理常式方法，以取得，然後呼叫屬性來存取繫結來源物件。The following example shows the implementation of a event handler that uses the method to obtain the and then calls the property to access the binding source object. `SavingsText`是繫結目標物件，並將其屬性是繫結目標屬性。The `SavingsText` is the binding target object, and its property is the binding target property. [!code-csharp[DirectionalBinding#OnRentRaise](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DirectionalBinding/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#onrentraise)] [!code-vb[DirectionalBinding#OnRentRaise](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DirectionalBinding/VisualBasic/DirectionalBinding.vb#onrentraise)]

summary.span: 將目前的繫結目標值傳送至 或 繫結的繫結來源屬性。

span.span: Sends the current binding target value to the binding source property in or bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會執行任何動作時繫結的不或。This method does nothing when the of the binding is not or . 如果繫結的值設定為，您必須呼叫方法或所做的變更將不會傳播到來源。If the value of your binding is set to , you must call the method or the changes will not propagate back to the source.

exception.span: 繫結已與目標中斷連結。

span.span: The binding has been detached from its target.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void UpdateTarget ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateTarget() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub UpdateTarget ()
public: override void UpdateTarget();

summary.span: 強制執行從繫結來源屬性至繫結目標屬性的資料傳輸。

span.span: Forces a data transfer from the binding source property to the binding target property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您強制從 source 屬性的資料傳輸至目標屬性。This method enables you to force a data transfer from the source property to the target property. 如果您的來源物件會實作適當的屬性變更通知機制，例如，目標更新會自動發生。If your source object implements a proper property-changed notification mechanism such as , target updates happen automatically. 不過，您必須使用這個方法來更新目標屬性明確地在您的來源物件不提供適當的屬性變更通知的情況下的選項。However, you have the option to use this method to update the target property explicitly in cases where your source object does not provide the proper property-changed notifications. 如果您的應用程式需要定期更新目標內容，您也可以使用這個方法。You can also use this method if your application needs to update the target properties periodically.

exception.span: 繫結已與目標中斷連結。

span.span: The binding has been detached from its target.
